name: Gunshifter: Ballet
description:
Gunshifter is a first-person shooter with a twist:

You can change the shape and thus the behaviour of your gun, but watch out -

if you change your gun, your enemies will adapt and change their shape!

The first version is called Gunshifter: Ballet. It is a super downscaled and buggy version of what I first envisioned. Send some bullets flying as you watch the red creatures dance around the area...

The next version called Gunshifter: Arena will come soon and will feature the following:

- Scoring system

- Dynamic soundtrack

- Bugs removed

Controls:

1,2,3 - Change Weapon shape

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Left Mousebutton - Shoot

Escape - Quit

Thanks for playing! :)
